GSD.description:
selinux: Add boundary check in put_entry()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit dedd558d9765b72c66e5a53948e9f5abc3ece1f6. For more details please see the references link.
